dcterms:creator: W. Mason
D. J. Watts
dcterms:description: A game inspired by exploratory drilling for oil, where participants interact with a landscape consisting of visible terrain and hidden oil yield, aiming to maximize their score based on rewards and costs.
dcterms:title: Wildcat Wells

dcterms:creator: K. Perlin
dcterms:description: Maps generated using Perlin noise, utilized to create varying terrain profiles for the online game, allowing for different levels of difficulty in the decision-making process.
dcterms:title: Perlin-noise generated maps

dcterms:creator: R. R. Hoffman
S. T. Mueller
G. Klein
J. Litman
dcterms:description: A survey designed to measure participants' acceptance of decision support systems, focusing on aspects such as trust, reliability, and predictability.
dcterms:title: Technology Acceptance Survey
